p: Seven flavonoids and biflavonoid, three anti-malarial compounds, seven anti-viral drugs and three vitamin molecules were subjected to automated docking within the active site of SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro catalytic-dyad. The superimposition of all docked flavones and biflavones (Fig. 6a), anti-malarial drugs (Fig. 6b), anti-viral drugs (Fig. 6c) and vitamins (Fig. 6d) are shown in Fig. 6 and various binding parameter have been tabulated in detail in Table 2.
